Class WifiScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.observer.LazyEmitter<T>
      • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.observer.DataEmitter<AccessPoints>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Emitter<AccessPoints>

    public class WifiScanner
extends DataEmitter<AccessPoints>
    Every mDelay milliseconds scans available access points informations and notifies subscribers.
